chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface
lalcii: lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface
miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface
lci: leader_completeness_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
glemi: ghost_log_entries_match_interface
tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> sorted es

Premises:
term = nat : Set
Inductive msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := MRRIR_init : msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | MRRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> msg_ref
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
logIndex = nat : Set
lifted_sorted_network : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> sorted es
lifted_entries_contiguous_nw = fun net : ghost_log_network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es pli : ghost_log_network -> Prop
lifted_handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (p : ghost_log_packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
entries_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> sorted es : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_invariant_nw = fun net : ghost_log_network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (lid : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (lci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t lid pli plt es lci -> In e (fst (pBody p)) -> eIndex e <= lci -> lifted_committed net e t : ghost_log_network -> Prop
lifted_maxIndex_sanity_append_entries : forall (xs : list ghost_log_packet) (p : ghost_log_packet) (ys : list ghost_log_packet) (net : ghost_log_network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list ghost_log_packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> lifted_maxIndex_sanity {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
handleAppendEntries_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope

terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> terms_and_indices_from_one entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_state_machine_safety_nw' = fun net : network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry) (t' : term), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> lifted_committed net e t' -> t >= t' -> prevLogIndex > eIndex e \/ prevLogIndex = eIndex e /\ prevLogTerm = eTerm e \/ eIndex e > maxIndex entries \/ In e entries : network -> Prop
ghost_log_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (l : ghost_msg) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> fst (pBody p) = l ->...-> Prop Arguments ghost_log_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

MRRIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (snd (pBody p)) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (snd (pBody p)) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

in_ghost_packet : forall (net : network) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> In (deghost_packet p) (nwPackets (deghost net))
